tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE product_performance (
    product_id INT,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    sales_amount DECIMAL,
    market_trend VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    inventory_count INT,
    date_added TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE MarketTrends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(255),
    trend_description TEXT,
    trend_type VARCHAR(50),
    trend_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    date_recorded TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Products (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name STRING,
    category STRING,
    price DECIMAL,
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE Sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_amount DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Products(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Trends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name STRING,
    description STRING,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);
